attributes.action: Stop the exemption of freedom of information on M.P's expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is democratically wrong to hide such information from the public. As we are the voters and the key power behind an M.Ps employment it is our right to know where taxpayers money is being wasted

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
